snippet.title: Unseen Announcement Trailer | Second-person Horror Puzzle Game 🧸👀
snippet.description:
The first full trailer for 'Unseen' - an immersive horror puzzle/adventure game where you play as Sophie, a young blind girl who sees through her teddy bear's eyes.
Escape the dark mansion, overcome frightening obstacles, escape your captors, and uncover the evil history lurking within this truly atmospheric and eerie experience.
'Unseen' blends first and second-person perspectives to create a one-of-a-kind gameplay experience. Wishlist it on Steam now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2526310/Unseen/

❤️‍🔥 Follow Unseen on:

🧸TIKTOK:  https://www.tiktok.com/@play.unseen
🧸 TWITTER:   https://x.com/play_unseen_
🧸 INSTAGRAM:   https://www.instagram.com/play_unseen/

#steam #steamrelease #horrorgame
